event.title: 2011 Irish Census, there are 65,928 in the Waterford Metropolitan District, however it does not include

data.event: According to the 2011 Irish Census, there are 65,928 in the Waterford Metropolitan District, however it does not include its suburbs in County Kilkenny and County Wexford.
The authority came into operation on 1 June 2014.
The office of the Mayor of Waterford was established in 1377.
